question: A man purchased a bedsheet for 450 Rs. and sold it at a gain of 10% calculated on the selling price. The selling price of the bedsheet was:
explanation:
Let the SP of the bedsheet be x Rs.
$latex \\therefore 450+\\frac{10\\times x}{100} = x&s=1$
$latex => x- \\frac{x}{10} = 450&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{9x}{10} = 450&s=1$
$latex => x = \\frac{450\\times 10}{9} = 500 Rs.&s=1$
Hence option [C] is the right answer.
